name: The Moon Mirror
desc: A legendary item claimed to have been used by the Frostmoon Scions in their ceremonies. At times, it is possible to glimpse curious scenes in the mirror's reflection...

imgDesc.text: A legendary item claimed to have been used by the Frostmoon Scions in their ceremonies. At times, it is possible to glimpse curious scenes in the mirror's reflection...

If the Moon-Prayer reflections inside or outside the mirror can be made to
meet, perhaps something good might happen...
Touch the deer statue near the Moon Mirror to reset the positions of the Moon-Prayer reflections.
